version_description:
- Minor visual corrections
- Minor bugfixes
- Performance improvements

- NEW: You can now connect your game to Facebook on opening screen!
- NEW: New Special Events added! (will start later on)
- BUGFIX: Items will no longer disappear when there's no place for new dirt to appear
- BUGFIX: Fixed an issue where game would crash on iPhone 6 and other lower model devices when downloading game data

- Major performance update for lower-end devices (similar to iPhone 6 and iPad Air 1) to prevent lag and crashes
- Minor bugfixes
- Visual corrections for iPhone X series
- VISUAL FIX: Fixed the issue with game screen appearing cut on some newer iPhone models

- VISUAL OPTIMIZATION: Fixed major visual issues that affected iPhone X series users
- Minor bugfixes
- Performance improvements

- NEW: New Special Events added (will start later)
- NEW: Players who join a club after the tournament has begun will no longer be able to contribute to the total club points
- NEW: A new Special Items set that can be bought with Golden Favors
- NEW: Up to 5 Extra Tournament tasks can now be bought (previously only 3 could be bought)
- NEW: Counters that are not accessible by the customers are now clearly visible
- BUGFIX: Fixed the bug where more serving boost from ovens fail to apply

- NEW: New Special Events added (will start later)
- NEW: Players who join a club after the tournament has begun will no longer be able to contribute to the total club points
- NEW: A new Special Items set that can be bought with Golden Favors
- NEW: Up to 5 Extra Tournament tasks can now be bought (previously only 3 could be bought)
- NEW: Counters that are not accessible by the customers are now clearly visible
- BUGFIX: Fixed the bug where more serving boost from ovens fail to apply
- Critical bug fixes

- NEW: New Special Events added (will start later on)
- BUGFIX: Facebook connection will no longer immediately disconnect
- BUGFIX: Appropriate task icons for new tournament tasks added

NEW: Premium Item Comment Collector added!
NEW: More dishes added to be unlocked with quests!
NEW: Winter Special Event added! (will start later on)
FIX: Cleaning floors while visiting should now correctly be counted towards goals
FIX: Wallpapers put on the corners of the cafe will no longer disappear when changed
FIX: Stoves with boosters will no longer stop working when one of them is put away

Happy Christmas!
-NEW: Masquerade Ball: A new party for you to enjoy
-NEW: Premium item Special Event Helper will help you get more event tokens!
-NEW: New Quests to earn more XP and other goodies!
-NEW: Customers can now buy food from ALL the counters in the cafe
-BUGFIX: Empty icons on Vending Machines can now be seen again
-BUGFIX: Fixed a rare issue where Lucky Spin wouldn't be reset
-Loading time optimizations

NEW: Get more Golden Vouchers with Voucher Box package in the Bank!
NEW: Special Events added! (will start later on)
BUGFIX: Fixed an issue where the game would crash upon expanding or decorating
BUGFIX: Fixed an issue where the same sticker would appear when a party sticker pack is opened
Performance optimizations to improve device storage usage

Fixed a problem where game data would be lost while switching between multiple games
Fixed a problem where messages would become invisible unless mailbox was refreshed

Hi there! Thank you for updating your game! Here're what we added with this update:

- Minor bug fixes
- Minor visual fixes

Hi there! Thank you for updating your game! Here's what we added with this update:

New: A brand new design to the Leagues tab in Cafe Clubs menu. Check it out!
New: Items in the inventory will now be listed in alphabetical order under the ALL category. Hurray!
New: Brand new quests added for your enjoyment!
New: A friendly in-game popup will ask you if you wish to update your game when a new one is available at the store!
Fixed various issues with the Tournament feature to enhance gameplay

Hi there! Thank you for updating your game! Here are what we added with this update:
- Minor bug fixes
- Minor visual fixes

Thank you for updating your game!

Here are what we added with this update:
- New Special Events! (will start at a later date)
- New quests for your enjoyment!

Thank you for updating your game! Here are what we added:

- New CELEBRITIES! Reach level 45 and up to meet them!
- XP gained from cooking dishes will increase as you expand your cafe!
- Customer comments will no longer appear on the bottom when Comment Collector collects them. Instead, they can be viewed through the "Show Comments" button.
- Tasks will no longer reset during the Tournament.
- Boxes filled in the Catering Challenge will no longer be counted less than they are.

Thank you for updating your game! Here are what we added:

-Club popup is back to normal as per popular demand!
-A button to Cook All the dishes on the stoves added as per popular demand!
-Shop item prices reduced to ensure a balanced gameplay
-Bugfix: Inactive cafe clubs will no longer appear on the main page

Thank you for updating your game! Here are what we added:

-Bugfix: Daily gifts and visiting now resets correctly
-Bugfix: Tournament tasks are now assigned correctly

Thank you for updating your game while you #stayHome! Here are what we added:

- New: Rainbow Market! Exchange items and vouchers for other currencies!
- New: Tournament tasks will be given in parts to create a more stable tournament experience!
- Bugfix: Throwing a party while the cafe is CLOSED is no longer available

Thank you for updating your game while you #stayHome! Here are what we added:

- New: Rainbow Market! Exchange items and vouchers for other currencies!
- New: Tournament tasks will be given in parts to create a more stable tournament experience!
- Bugfix: Paperbag food is now available for filling catering boxes and online orders
- Bugfix: Throwing a party while the cafe is CLOSED is no longer available

Thank you for updating your game while you #stayHome! Here are what we added:

- NEW Quests for your enjoyment!
- NEW Celebrities you can meet!
- You can now access cookbook in your profile even when your stoves are full!
- Various bugfixes

Thank you for updating your game while you #stayHome! Here's what we fixed:

- Bugfix: Fixed a rare occurance where players would have trouble accesing the bank

Thank you for updating your game while you #stayHome! Here are what we added:

-NEW healthy and sweet dishes you can cook!
-Visual improvement
-Various bugfixes

Thank you for updating your game while you #stayHome! Here are what we added:
-Various bugfixes
-Visual improvement

Thank you for updating your game while you #stayHome! Here are what we added:
-Various bugfixes
-Visual improvement

Thank you for updating your game while you #stayHome! Here are what we added:

-Fixed an issue which causes a "black screen" when the game is closed
-Fixed an issue which prevents editing while writing help tickets and messages.
-Various minor bugfixes

Thank you for updating your game while you #stayHome! Here's what's new:

-Helping made easier! You can now help fellow club members without spending your own food!
-NEW fun machines and NEW quests!
-Fixed an issue which caused random items in the cafe to turn into vending machines
-Performance improvements

Thank you for updating your game while you #stayHome! Here's what's new:

-Fixed an issue related to parties
-Fixed a rare issue that causes inability to visit neighbors

Thank you for updating your game while you #stayHome! Here's what's new:

-NEW Celebrities for your enjoyment!
-Option to choose all stoves while cooking and serving all cooked dishes added
-Community tab is now accessible while you visit fellow chefs!
-Fixed an issue where the help request would dissappear before being completed or being expired

Thank you for updating!

-Dishes will no longer spoil. Anti-spoil Sauce is now called Magic Sauce and is used for bringing Catering Trucks and getting new Tournament Tasks
-Option to Serve All the dishes made available
-Option to sign in and save the game with Apple Sign-in added
-Visual improvements
-Various bug fixes

Thank you for updating!

-Catering and Online orders icons on Club Help bars are now bigger for better visibility
-Improvements and fixes are made to improve the Tournament experience
-Improvements to Apple Sign-in
-Servings are now displayed correctly on the Cookbook
-Names of the visiting neighbors are now visible once again

Thanks for updating!

- Dishes can now be added to your "favorites" and can be sorted by your favorites. Click on the heart on the corner of each dish!
- Eva sends daily gifts now! Hurray!
- Special Events renewed: Event items now have a fixed token price and will be received randomly
- Several bugfixes and improvements

Thanks for updating!

- Dishes can now be added to your "favorites" and can be sorted by your favorites
- Eva sends daily gifts now! Hurray!
- Special Events renewed: Event items now have a fixed token price and will be received randomly (will start later on)
- Several bugfixes and improvements

Thanks for updating!

-Serving with Serve All button now gives the correct amount of event tokens
-Added new informative visuals to Special Items
-Fixed an issue where Special Items would be seen on the Shop
-Performance improvements
Important Bugfix: Fixed an issue that prevented some players from entering the game

Thanks for updating!

- New Floor Tiles and Wallpapers added!
- The ALL tab in Inventory will no longer jump to the beginning of the list when an item is placed in the cafe
- Fixed an issue where completed quests would appear for some players
- Performance improvements

Thanks for updating!

- New Floor Tiles and Wallpapers added!
- The ALL tab in Inventory will no longer jump to the beginning of the list when an item is placed in the cafe
- Fixed an issue where completed quests would appear for some players
- Performance improvements

Thanks for updating! Here's what we added:

- Performance improvements
- Minor visual fixes

Thanks for updating!

New Quests added! Enjoy!
Snowy background added!
Catering Truck or the Online Order Machine will no longer take the wrong dish instead of the one that was clicked on
Various other bug fixes
Visual corrections

- Various bug fixes
- Performance improvements

Thanks for updating!


- Item and currency names added to Rainbow Market
- Tables that can be bought from Decoration Shop received visual improvements
- Fixed an issue where visiting chef comments couldn't be clicked
- Fixed an issue where some players experienced difficulty when getting celebrity level up rewards

- Various bug fixes
- Performance improvements

- Various bug fixes
- Performance improvements

Thanks for updating!

-Gift messages sent by your friends will no longer clutter the Mailbox making it harder to reach and claim newer ones. Claimed gift messages will disappear when the game is reopened
-Improved Zendesk interface to better your support experience
-Fixed an issue that causes wallpapers to disappear while being placed

- Various bug fixes
- Performance improvements

Thanks for updating!




- Decoration Mode improvement: Covering floors should now be easier
- While visiting friends, the friend list below will now stay on the friend you're currently visiting
- Performance improvements

Thank you for updating your game!


Bugfix: Fixed an issue where the game would sometimes crash after filling a catering box

Thank you for updating your game!
- Various bugfixes
- Performance improvements

- Various bug fixes
- Performance improvements

Thanks for updating!
-Special Event tokens can now be earned via collecting Vouchers! (Tokens can only be earned during Special Events as usual)
-You can now fill as many catering boxes as you want during the tournament to make some extra points!
-Customers will no longer exit the cafe through the walls

Thanks for updating!
-Special Event tokens can now be earned via collecting Vouchers! (Tokens can only be earned during Special Events as usual)
-You can now fill as many catering boxes as you want during the tournament to make some extra points!
-Customers will no longer exit the cafe through the walls

Thank you for updating your game! Here's what's new:

- Fixed a visual bug where it looked like players were getting wrong number of special event tokens when they claimed tournament and challenge rewards
- Visual improvements

Thanks for updating!
- Did you know Special Events were called Special Events? Now you do!
- Fill All option added for catering truck! Now you can fill all your catering boxes in one go for a small cash amount without spending any food of your own!
- Fixed an issue where some players couldn't view the new version of some of the chairs
- Fixed an issue where some items looked low quality for some iPhone users

Thanks for updating!

-Fill All option added for catering truck! Now you can fill all your catering boxes in one go for a small cash amount without spending any food of your own!
-Fixed an issue where some players couldn't view the new version of some of the chairs

Thanks for updating!

- Various bugfixes and performance improvements

Thanks for updating!

- The rule for contributing to the catering challenge to get rewards has been lifted
- Fixed a rare visual bug where the catering truck would become invisible or sideways
- Fixed an issue where buying party items would not count towards task progress
- Visual improvements

Thanks for updating!

- New Feature: Reminders! Never miss a thing to do in your cafe, check the neat reminder list to find out what to do next!
- You will get extra coins for every box you fill after your club completes the Catering Challenge!
- Claim All button added for friend gifts!
- Fixed an issue where expansion arrows would randomly appear in visited cafes
- Fixed a rare visual bug where a catering box would appear glitched during a party

Thank you for updating!
- Bug fixed where the "Earn Coins" task wouldn't always count!
- Category images added for the dishes on the counters!
- Improvements on the reminder system!
- Visual improvements

Thanks for updating!



- Fixed an issue where it would require more than the limit of Wholesale Sauces when you sell a lot of food
- Visual improvements
- Various bugfixes

Thanks for updating!
- Various bugfixes and performance improvements

Thanks for updating!
- SPECIAL EVENT: Grand Bazaar
- Various bugfixes
- Performance improvements
- Visual improvements

- SPECIAL EVENT: Grand Bazaar
- Fixed the bug where Eva would appear during visit

- Fixed an issue where the game would start in the wrong language
